result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Trayvon Earl Kern

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Trayvon Earl Kern appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Annamarie Amy Wineke appeared by video for Trayvon Earl Kern.  Prosecuting attorney Thomas Hasle in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Court took judicial notice of 16CF4638, 19CF4552, 19CF4988, 20CF2292 and 20CF3558. Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer R. Lautenbach. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 04.
Scheduling conference scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Trayvon Earl Kern not in court, in custody.  Attorney Annamarie Amy Wineke in court for Trayvon Earl Kern.  Attorney Daniel T Flaherty in court for State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status of counsel. Case previously set for prelim. Case remains set for prelim.
Status conference scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Defendant's Motion for Bail Reduction.  (Trayvon E. Kern - #2022009797, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Defendant Trayvon Earl Kern not in court, in custody.  Attorney Annamarie Winieke not in court. Prosecuting attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case is set for a Preliminary Hearing. State's Witness was present. Defense Counsel did not appear and did not contact the court. Case is adjourned. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Trayvon Earl Kern not in court.  Attorney Daniel T Flaherty in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Reed in court for the PD's office. Atty Wienke in court and accepts appointment. Court sets prelim in prelim court.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Trayvon Earl Kern not in court, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for cause to the trial court for a State V. Lee Hearing. Case to be heard in Br. 9 for Br 4.
Hearing scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Hearing on no contact order scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Motion for Discovery - 2ND DEMAND REQUEST.  (Trayvon E. Kern - #2022009797, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Defendant Trayvon Kern not in court, in custody. Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for State of Wisconsin in court.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Status of Counsel in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Status conference scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with Phylicia M T.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Trayvon Earl Kern in court with attorney Amanda Poznanski.  Defendant Trayvon Earl Kern in custody.  Karen Lynch Vespalec appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Trayvon Earl Kern appeared by video means with Attorney. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Hanrahan, Branch 04. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
